1.text: Cut off both ends of the dragon fruit using a sharp knife.

2.text: Create a cut along the length of the skin to keep the fruit whole.

3.text: Slice the dragon fruit in half for an easy peeling process.

4.text: Peel the skin off slowly using your fingers.

5.text: Remove any excess skin using a sharp knife.

6.text: Slice the dragon fruit in half lengthwise.

7.text: Use a spoon to scoop the pulp out of the dragon fruit.

8.text: Place the pulp in a clean bowl.

9.text: Remove any skin still attached to the dragon fruit.

10.text: Eat your pieces of dragon fruit or use them in a recipe.
